Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal.`` Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. of a top-selling tabloid newspaper. Andy Coulson denies any knowledge of the hacking, but admitted on Friday he'd committed a cardinal sin for a back room operator- he became the story. Andy Coulson said continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 per cent needed in his role as Downing Street communications chief.`` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on.''

key given to Michael Vick . Richard Hunter showed the council a picture of his black pit bull Mel, used by Michael Vick as a bait dog to train fighting dogs before he was seized by authorities. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city`` rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city.''
